articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Indonesia's coronavirus cases hit a record 54,500 in a single day, overtaking India to become epicentre - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's northern neighbour reports more than 50,000 new COVID-19 infections for the first time, catapulting the country past India as Asia's COVID-19 epicentre.
articles.content:
Virus-wracked Indonesia has reported more than 50,000 new COVID-19 infections for the first time, catapulting Australia's northern neighbour past India as Asia's COVID-19 epicentre.
